casebody.data:
Ida WELCH; Ivory Welch, Plaintiffs-Appellants v. THYSSENKRUPP ELEVATOR CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellee. No. 06-60899

Summary Calendar.

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. July 9, 2007. Frank C. Jones, III, for Plaintiffs-Appellants. James R. Moore, Jr., Copeland, Cook, Taylor & Bush, Ridgeland, MS, for Defendant-Appellee.

Before SMITH, WIENER, and OWEN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM: *

AFFIRMED. See Rule 47.6.

Pursuant to 5th Cir. R. 47.5, the court has determined that this opinion should not be published and is not precedent except under the limited circumstances set forth in 5th Cir. R. 47.5.4.
